Text: Crashes everytime? Anyone else?  And no, i am not a noob at this stuff... I patched and cracked correctly... It starts up to graphics settings etc, then  load up..crashes... any ideas?
I have it on good authority that Egosoft is about to remove the copy protection of X3 TC (bonus patch coming very soon) for people who actually bother with cracks anyway heh. Anyway, just my 2ct.
